SPI_Params_s Struct Reference
SPI Driver » SPI Driver API

SPI Parameters. More...

#include <SPI.h>

void * custom
 

Detailed Description

SPI Parameters.

SPI Parameters are used to with the SPI_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using SPI_Params_init().

See also
SPI_Params_init()

Field Documentation

uint32_t SPI_Params_s::bitRate

SPI bit rate in Hz

void* SPI_Params_s::custom

Custom argument used by driver implementation

uint32_t SPI_Params_s::transferTimeout

Transfer timeout in system ticks (Not supported with all implementations
